p: Field measurements show that full sun system received the highest amount of radiation, followed by SH1, SH2, and SH3 shaded systems. SH1 radiation did not differ statistically from the control (full sun). SH2 and SH3 received, on average, 15.2% and 29.4% less radiation than the control, respectively, differing statistically from the other treatments, as shown in Table 2.
